recommendations.description: The Cluster Storage Operator is degraded because the vCenter account misses the privilege of 'Inventory.Tagging.ObjectAttachable'
recommendations.generic: The Cluster Storage Operator is degraded because the vCenter account misses the privilege of 'Inventory.Tagging.ObjectAttachable' which is used by the vSphere CSI driver when creating StorageClasses.

recommendations.description: Configuring Build Strategy via admin or edit ClusterRoles is not recommended
recommendations.generic:
OpenShiftâ€™s Build Strategies offer developers a range of options for efficiently
building and deploying containerized applications. Configuring Build Strategies
via `admin` or `edit` ClusterRoles for users is not recommended. It may conflict
with the configuration via the authorization policies, thereby introducing security
risks.

recommendations.description: GSS does not provide enterprise-level support for an OKD cluster
recommendations.generic: Red Hat Global Support Services does not provide enterprise-level support for an OKD cluster.
